title: No Gentleman Cho' Gath in Gentleman Bundle???
body: Just wondering why Gentleman Cho' Gath isn't included in the namely "Gentleman Bundle." Any thoughts?

replies.body:
We discounted a few 1820 RP skins in the past when we put them in the legacy vault. When this happened, players who payed full price were refunded the difference. 

Generally speaking, though, we don't discount legendary skins, which is why he's not in this bundle.
It is a legendary skin, and legendary skins are never go on sale.
Because Gentleman Cho'Gath is a legendary skin, and legendary skins are never discounted.
